title: # 384 - Moshe Kasher & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Moshe Kasher to talk about going to war, weird schools, competitive Women, crowd work and much more!

Download Moshe’s comedy album “Crowd Surfing” Jan 24th wherever you get your music!

This episode is brought to you by Whoop. Go to www.WHOOP.com right now. Use the code BERT at checkout for 15% off your membership today.

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is brought to you by Mercari. Don’t let your old stuff go to waste. You can find Mercari on the app stores or at www.mercari.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Turbo Tax. TurboTax Live gives you personal access to experienced CPAs and EAs who are there for you, even on nights and weekends. So, you can be sure to get your best possible refund and feel 100% confident in your taxes. Go to www.turbotax.com today.

It’s time to deal with that nagging health concern.  Explore the amazing CBD products at www.CBDistillery.com and enter “Bertcast” at checkout for my special discount .

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

To Follow me on.. Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
